activities:
SnapEngage is a service provider of a chat service feature to customers.
Personal information is used to provide our service to our customers.

SnapEngage collects the following personal information:
 - Email address
 - Name
 - Cookies for purposes such as session handling

If our customers' personally identifiable information changes, or if our customer no longer desires our service, our customer may correct, update, or delete the information by making the change on our member information page or by contacting us by telephone or postal mail.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and customer data processed automatically and manually.
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor program, the web page for consumers may be found here: http://www.bbb.org/council/eusafeharbor/bbb-eu-safe-harbor-dispute-resolution-program
